name: Deadline (itch) (enegames)
description:
• Interact with many unique characters
  • Discover amusing  side-quests
  • Find your way around the maze of interconnected lines
  • Features original music
  • Multiple solutions to progressing the story
  • Unexpected comedy and puns
  • Auto and manual save points
  • Beautiful full-screen photograph backgrounds
Credits

Code, graphics & story - Jeff Schomay
Story - Joey Kendrick
Music - Josh Cutler

Built with the Elm Narrative Engine.

Additional credits

Future development plans

We have much more planned for Steve in the subway.  The pieces are set, Steve has learned to break the rules, and things are starting to get exciting.

We are looking for a publishing partner to help us complete the rest of the story and release the full game.  Interested parties should contact jeff@elmnarrativeengine.com.
